text:
Sessions appear to be broken completely in this release. Not even the examples
work; the cart example can't even remember what I have in it. It appears that I
get a new session created for every request for every page. I found some posts
on the net arguing the same, and so far I think they are substantiated. I am
embedding tomcat into my application and this breaks our backs. Any fixes?
creator: peter@tiansoft.com
nacho@apache.org
text:
This session has probed to work ( at least works on my setups ).

Please be more explicit in teh setup of the client you are using, perhaps is 
related to the client not in the server..

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Not enough data to reproduce,  it seems to work fine for most people ( both
3.2.3 and 3.3 )
